description: Marc is a friendly, upbeat half-human/half-cyborg character with a confident, playful vibe, often posed as if presenting, explaining, or joking with the viewer.

features.distinguishing: Half of the head/face is exposed cybernetic machinery with metallic plating and a single glowing blue robotic/cybernetic eye device; rounded cartoon proportions and expressive gestures (hands up, open palms, hands on hips).
features.costume: Yellow short-sleeve shirt with a bold black zigzag stripe across the chest, paired with black shorts and black shoes.
features.style: Stylized 3D cartoon character (clean shapes, smooth shading), usually presented on a solid black background.

images.description: A stylized character in a yellow zigzag shirt sits front-facing in a dark armchair, with half the head shown as a metallic cyborg surface and one glowing blue cybernetic eye.

Stylized character bust in a yellow shirt with a black zigzag pattern, shown in 3/4 view facing right with part of the head rendered as exposed mechanical/cybernetic components and a blue-lensed eye device on a solid black background.

Full-body stylized cartoon character standing with arms out, wearing a yellow zigzag shirt and shorts, with half of the head and one eye rendered as exposed cybernetic machinery against a solid black background.

Full-body 3D cartoon character with a half-cyborg head (one glowing blue robotic eye), wearing a yellow zigzag shirt, black shorts, and black shoes, posed with hands on hips on a solid black background.

Front-facing stylized character with a half-mechanical head and a glowing blue cybernetic eye, wearing a yellow shirt with a black zigzag stripe and holding both hands raised near the shoulders against a solid black background.
A stylized 3D character shown from the chest up, smiling with one eye closed, wearing a yellow shirt with a black zigzag and a mechanical-looking right eye piece against a solid black background.

A 3D stylized character shown from the chest up, facing forward with a slight smile, a half-human/half-robot head and a blue glowing cybernetic eye piece, wearing a yellow shirt with a black zigzag while one hand touches the side of the head and the other is held up in a small gesture.
A stylized seated character in a yellow zigzag shirt with half of the head/face covered in metallic cybernetic plating and a glowing circular eye device, shown against a solid black background.
Full-body 3D cartoon character with a half-human/half-cyborg head, yellow zigzag shirt and black shorts, standing and gesturing with open hands on a solid black background.
3D cartoon character with a half-human, half-cyber head wearing a yellow shirt with a black zigzag, eyes closed in a slight smile, hands raised as if gesturing against a black background.
3D cartoon-style character with a partially cybernetic head and a glowing eyepiece, wearing a yellow shirt with a black zigzag and giving a thumbs-up on a solid black background.
Full-body 3D cartoon character in a yellow zigzag shirt and black shorts with a partially cybernetic head and one hand raised in a wave against a black background.

3D cartoon-style character shown from the chest up, with a half-cyborg face featuring a glowing blue circular eye piece, wearing a yellow shirt and raising one hand in a wave against a solid black background.
3D cartoon character in a yellow shirt with a black zigzag stripe, shown from the upper torso up in right-facing side view with one hand raised near the collar against a solid black background.

A stylized 3D character standing in a slight 3/4 view, wearing a yellow shirt with a black zigzag and black shorts, with the right side of the head rendered as exposed circuitry and a glowing blue mechanical eye on a black background.
